author: arunkumar413
name: Funny Animal
description:
Funny Animal is a simple theme with green color backround for panel and popup. The font is white, bold for panel and white for popup menu. The popup border is red. Current day is highlighted in a red circle. I've also included the wallpaper "funny animal" in the theme zip file.

Installation Instructions:

Download the zip file and extract it to /home/user/.themes

where user is your user name on the linux system.

suggestions and feedbacks are welcome.
